meanings.definition: A person or device that measures or records time.
meanings.sent1: The timers in the kitchen help us keep track of when to take out the cookies.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new timer for my camera to capture the perfect moment.
meanings.sent3: The timers at the race finish line were all cheering for the fastest runner.
meanings.sent4: Her heart acted like a timer, counting down the moments until the big announcement.
meanings.sent5: The old grandfather clock served as a reliable timer for the family gatherings.

meanings.definition: A device used to set a specific amount of time for an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The teacher set the timers for the students to complete the test in time.
meanings.sent2: I rely on my phone's timer to remind me when to check on the dinner in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The timers for the game show were accidentally set for only ten seconds!
meanings.sent4: The sand in the hourglass acted as a timer, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The timer on the bomb was the only thing standing between them and disaster.
